initial_reviews.review_title: Incredible platform to work where all messaging service on single place
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Apifon?
All esteemed messaging services are on under a single roof, especially WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and email.

What do you dislike about Apifon?
Limited features in automation and privacy issues. For each messaging platform, we have to give them access to read, and delete messages. So for my personal account it's come to trust issues rest it is awesome.

What problems is Apifon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Saving time and having more options for customers to choose from and a single place to manage almost messaging applications. Automation works very quickly so customers get a faster response from the admin team.

initial_reviews.review_title: User friendly interface - Combines all channels in one place!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Apifon?
Greatly applied in all industries - Startups, SMEs, Enterprise.
Combines all channels in one place and it's super convenient.
Easy to use and navigate. The ability to easily segment and sent automated sequences to different groups is fantastic!
Their support is always on point and it's very helpful.
It definitely deserves a try.

What do you dislike about Apifon?
Nothing really. I am fully satisfied so far.

What problems is Apifon solving and how is that benefiting you?
I personally used a different provider before switching to Apifon. The list management and the ease to segment and group is so convenient now. I personally love their sign up forms which helped me a lot grow our audience. Works like a charm!
